name: Jailbreak (itch) (AqoursSSBU, Andy Quintuna, savnair)
description:
Escape a prison with nothing but your trusty handgun, or decide to go without it! Navigate 3 levels of increasing difficulty and collect as many coins as you can along the way. Make sure you collect the keys before getting to the door at the end.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Left click to shoot
  • Esc to retry the level
  • Backspace to quit the game

Made by me, andy-quintana, and savnair
